title: Fix ambient sound playback and adjust timer/quote layout spacing

requirements.summary: Debug and fix the ambient sound player to ensure all sounds (rain, coffee shop, forest, waves, white noise, lofi beats) successfully play audio when the play button is clicked
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking play on any ambient sound (rain, coffee shop, forest, waves, white noise, lofi beats) successfully plays the corresponding audio
Audio playback continues until paused by the user
Volume slider correctly adjusts the audio output level
No console errors related to audio playback

file_operations.description: Fix the Audio element initialization and playback logic. Ensure proper audio source loading by verifying the audio file paths are correct and accessible. Add error handling for audio loading failures. Implement proper play() promise handling to catch and resolve playback issues. Ensure the audio element is properly created and configured before attempting playback. Add console logging for debugging audio state transitions and catch any exceptions during play/pause operations.

requirements.summary: Adjust the vertical positioning so the timer is moved down slightly from its current position while remaining horizontally centered
acceptanceCriteria: Timer display is positioned lower on the screen than its current location
Vertical spacing creates clear separation from the quote above

file_operations.description: Adjust the vertical positioning of the TimerSection component by modifying its container margins or padding. Increase the top margin or add additional vertical spacing to push the timer down slightly while maintaining horizontal centering. Ensure the layout grid accommodates the new positioning without breaking the responsive design.

requirements.summary: Ensure the motivational quote and timer display have sufficient vertical spacing between them so they are clearly separated and do not overlap
acceptanceCriteria: Quote and timer have clear visual separation with adequate vertical spacing
No overlapping occurs between quote text and timer display
Both elements remain fully readable and distinct from each other

file_operations.description: Increase the vertical spacing between the MotivationalQuote and TimerSection components. Add margin-bottom to the quote container or margin-top to the timer section to create clear visual separation. Ensure sufficient gap so the quote and timer do not overlap or appear too close together, maintaining readability and visual hierarchy. Keep the flat white text design without backgrounds or shadows.

Review and adjust the positioning of the quote component if needed to complement the spacing changes in TimerPage. Ensure the quote remains visually distinct and does not interfere with the timer display below it. Maintain the centered overlay positioning while allowing proper spacing for the timer beneath.
